item.description: Angular Provider is like a command to Angular Dependency Injection system regarding how to get an object/instance for a particular dependency.

item.title: Learnings From Clean Code
item.description: Learnings from Robert “Uncle Bob” Martin Robert Martin, fondly known as “Uncle Bob” in our community, is a software engineer and more famously an author and one of the founding fathers of Software Craftsmanship movement.

item.title: Why Code Coverage Should Not Be Your Measure of Reliability
item.description: What is code coverage? Code coverage is a measure (in percentage) of the degree to which the source code of a program is executed wh­en a particular test suite is run.

item.description: The Checklist Manifesto by Atul Gawande, walks us through the benefits of the humble checklist.

item.description: Any organization is the sum of its people and employees are its main spokespeople.

item.title: Planning & Communication
